HOME.DESCRIPTION: Expert software developer proficient in .NET, Angular, and React, with experience in relational databases. Delivering efficient and scalable solutions.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Yeison
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: I am a passionate software developer with 5 years of experience, specializing in creating innovative and efficient solutions. My professional background includes projects in ERP software integration, application development for international trade management, and custom software creation. Throughout my career, I have stood out for my problem-solving skills, ability to work in a team, and assertive communication.
